Package View

Interface GridShape

All Known Implementing Classes:
SelectableShape, ShipView, SquareShape
public interface GridShape
A shape that is a part of a scene.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean contains​(java.awt.geom.Point2D p)
    Tests whether this item contains a given point.
    void draw​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
    Draws this item.
    void drawSelection​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
    Draws the selection adornment of this item.
    java.awt.Color getColor()
    A method that returns the color of the square
    java.awt.Point getPosition()
    A method that returns the position of the square's high-left corner with a Point datatype.
    int[] indexOf()
    returns Array of grid coordinate of the item in a grid.
    boolean isSelected()
    Gets the selection state of this item.
    boolean isVertical()
    checks if the item is vertical.
    void setColor​(java.awt.Color color)
    sets the default color of the item.
    void setIndex​(int x, int y)
    sets the coordinate the item in a grid.
    void setPosition​(int x, int y)
    a method that sets the position of the square.
    void setPosition​(java.awt.Point p)
    Sets the position of the ShipView object into point p.
    void setSelected​(boolean b)
    Sets the selection state of this item.
    void setVertical​(boolean vertical)
    sets the rotational orientation of the item.
    void translate​(int dx, int dy)
    Translates this item by a given amount.

    • draw

      Draws this item.

    • drawSelection

      Draws the selection adornment of this item.
      Parameters:
      g2 - the graphics context

      void setSelected​(boolean b)
      Sets the selection state of this item.
      Parameters:
      b - true if this item is selected

    • isSelected

      boolean isSelected()
      Gets the selection state of this item.
      Returns:
      true if this item is selected

    • translate

      void translate​(int dx, int dy)
      Translates this item by a given amount.
      Parameters:
      dx - the amount to translate in x-direction
      dy - the amount to translate in y-direction

    • contains

      boolean contains​(java.awt.geom.Point2D p)
      Tests whether this item contains a given point.
      Parameters:
      p - a point
      Returns:
      true if this item contains p

    • indexOf

      int[] indexOf()
      returns Array of grid coordinate of the item in a grid. returns {-1,-1} if it's not on a grid.
      Returns:
      Array of grid coordinate. [0] is x coordinate, [1] is y coordinate.

    • setIndex

      void setIndex​(int x, int y)
      sets the coordinate the item in a grid.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate.
      y - y coordinate.

    • setVertical

      void setVertical​(boolean vertical)
      sets the rotational orientation of the item.
      Parameters:
      vertical - sets if the item is vertical or not.

    • isVertical

      boolean isVertical()
      checks if the item is vertical.
      Returns:
      return true if vertical.

    • setPosition

      void setPosition​(int x, int y)
      a method that sets the position of the square.
      Parameters:
      x - The x position on the GUI.
      y - The y position on the GUI.

    • setPosition

      void setPosition​(java.awt.Point p)
      Sets the position of the ShipView object into point p.
      Parameters:
      p - Point object p.

    • getPosition

      java.awt.Point getPosition()
      A method that returns the position of the square's high-left corner with a Point datatype.
      Returns:
      A x,y position of the square in GUI into a Point datatype.

    • setColor

      void setColor​(java.awt.Color color)
      sets the default color of the item.
      Parameters:
      color - default color.

    • getColor

      java.awt.Color getColor()
      A method that returns the color of the square
      Returns:
      The color of the square
